An election of officers for next
year was held at a dinner last
Monday night by the Tau Beta Pi
Honorary Engineering Fraternity.
The dinner, held at 8 o'clock in
the Barn, was the last affair of the
scholastic year for Tau Beta Pi.
New officers elected at this time
were: Edward J. Mount, president; Lawrason Riggs Kent, vicepresident; Hugh M. Smallwood,
correspotding secretary; Lee Kinsey, recording secretary; John
Thomas Dixon, treasurer.

TAU BETA PI HOLDS ELECTION OF OFFICERS
An election of officers for next
year was held at a dinner last
Monday night by the Tau Beta Pi
Honorary Engineering Fraternity.
The dinner, held at 8 o'clock in
the Barn, was the last affair of the
scholastic year for Tau Beta Pi.
New officers elected at this time
were: Edward J. Mount, president; Lawrason Riggs Kent, vicepresident; Hugh M. Smallwood,
correspotding secretary; Lee Kinsey, recording secretary; John
Thomas Dixon, treasurer.
William North Crout was elected arif associate editor of the national publication of the society,
